title: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27" 4K UHD WLED LCD Monitor - 16:9 - Black, Silver
article_markdown:
### Introduction
The Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27" 4K UHD WLED LCD Monitor is a versatile display that caters to a wide range of users, from gamers to professionals seeking high-quality visuals. With its 16:9 widescreen resolution, 400 Nit brightness, and fast response time, this monitor promises an immersive viewing experience. Let's explore its features, design, and user experiences to understand why it stands out in the market.

### Key Features and Benefits
The Dell U2723QE boasts a 16:9 widescreen resolution, making it ideal for various tasks such as watching movies, gaming, and office work. Its Anti-glare, 3H Hard Coating ensures a comfortable viewing experience without unwanted reflections. The 400 Nit brightness delivers crisp content and vibrant colors, enhancing visual quality across different activities.

Connectivity is a strong suit of this monitor, featuring HDMI input for seamless connection to top-tier PCs, Blu-ray players, and gaming consoles. The 5 ms GTG response time makes it perfect for action-packed films, sports, or gaming sessions. Moreover, the 4K resolution at 60 Hz provides sharp images and detailed visuals, essential for professional work and entertainment.

### Design and Performance
The Dell U2723QE stands out with its sleek design, featuring thin bezels that offer a modern aesthetic. Users appreciate the symmetrical bezels and the neatly tucked Dell logo under the display, enhancing the overall look. The color accuracy out of the box eliminates the need for further calibration, ensuring a visually pleasing experience from the moment it's turned on.

While the monitor excels in everyday use and picture/video editing with its super sharp display, some users have noted minor issues. A slight wobble in the monitor, especially when raised, can be a drawback for some users. Additionally, occasional black screen incidents upon waking the computer have been reported, highlighting areas for improvement in user experience.

### Customer Insights
Customer reviews highlight the Dell U2723QE's value proposition compared to high-end alternatives. Users appreciate the monitor's compatibility with MacBooks, seamless usb-c connection, and the affordable price point relative to premium brands like Apple. The high pixel density offers sharp text and crisp images, making it a great choice for detailed work or office tasks.

On the downside, glare from sunlight or indoor lighting can be a concern for some users. Despite this issue, the monitor's 4K picture quality and extensive port selection, including a USB-C port for charging MacBooks, make it a versatile choice for various setups.

### Conclusion
In conclusion, the Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27" 4K UHD WLED LCD Monitor combines impressive features, modern design, and user-friendly functionalities to cater to a diverse audience. While it excels in delivering sharp visuals, seamless connectivity, and a sleek appearance, minor issues like wobbling and occasional black screen incidents need attention. Overall, for those seeking a high-quality monitor with excellent value for money, the Dell U2723QE proves to be a compelling choice.
pros: Thin bezels with symmetrical design for an aesthetically pleasing look
Color accuracy without the need for further calibration
Seamless compatibility with MacBook through USB-C connection
Integrated 4k camera and forward-facing speakers for enhanced functionality
High PPI for sharper text and images, suitable for office tasks and photo editing
cons: Occasional screen blackouts requiring unplugging and replugging
Wobbling monitor design affecting typing experience
Glare issues in well-lit environments impacting visibility
Limited functionality in gaming applications with light bleed in dark scenes
Inconvenient port placement and cord exit design making cable management challenging
